title: I Will Be Selfish in a Different World! The Story of a Selfish Saint Candidate
description: Hatsuko Obata, also known as "Oba-chan," had taken care of her younger brothers on behalf of her busy parents. She can now finally leave hers parents' house to get a job and enjoy her freedom! Or so she thought.  Due to a god's mistake, she met her demise. As an apology, she was given a choice between becoming a saint and starting over in a different world, so she chose to reincarnate in order to fulfill her dream of "living freely." With many cheats given to her by an apologetic God, she can now enjoy another world as much as she wants with her different skills and protections!
